thread.title: eGlobalTech wins HHS Enterprise Security Program Support (ESPS) Task Order
thread.title_full: eGlobalTech wins HHS Enterprise Security Program Support (ESPS) Task Order

author: admin
title: eGlobalTech wins HHS Enterprise Security Program Support (ESPS) Task Order
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 7:22 AM   eGlobalTech 
ARLINGTON, Va., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- eGlobalTech (eGT), a leading provider in management, security and IT consulting services for the Federal Government, has expanded its work with the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) Office of Information Security (OIS) to include Governance Risk and Compliance (GRC) and Information Sharing support. eGT received the initial $106 million task order in 2014, against its GSA Schedule 70 contract, doing program management for OIS, which is still ongoing. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130509/MM11093LOGO 
"eGT is dedicated to supporting CISOs and their organizations across the Federal Government; and now we have the opportunity to make significant contributions to a security program which protects not only HHS IT assets, but also the Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and Protected Health Information (PHI) of millions of Americans", said Ms. Cuello, eGT's Director of Information Assurance and Cyber Security. 
The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) is the U.S. government's principal agency for protecting the health of all Americans and providing essential human services, especially for those who are least able to help themselves. 
About eGlobalTech 
eGlobalTech (eGT) is a woman-owned management consulting and IT solutions firm based in Arlington, Virginia. eGT supports multiple federal customers including the Departments of Health and Human Services, Homeland Security, State, Education, Labor, Energy, the General Services Administration, and Defense. For more information, please visit www.eglobaltech.com .
